type DataSourceControl = class inherit Control interface IDataSource interface IListSource

summary.span: 作为某些控件的基类，这些控件表示数据绑定控件的的数据源。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that represent data sources to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件被称为数据绑定控件，而用于简化绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任意数据源：关系数据库、文件、流、业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以一致的方式向数据绑定控件提供数据，而与基础数据的源或格式无关。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 使用随 ASP.NET 提供的数据源控件（包括 、 和 ）来执行大多数 Web 开发任务。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 如果要实现自己的自定义数据源控件，请使用基类。You use the base class when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 虽然实现接口的任何类 都是数据源控件，但大多数 ASP.NET 数据源控件都扩展 了抽象类，该类提供了接口的基实现 。While any class that implements the interface is a data source control, most ASP.NET data source controls extend the abstract class, which provides a base implementation of the interface. 类还提供接口的实现 ，这使你能够以编程方式将数据源控件分配到 `DataSource` 数据绑定控件的属性，并将数据作为基本列表返回到控件。The class also provides an implementation of the interface, which enables you to programmatically assign the data source control to the `DataSource` property of a data-bound control and return data to the control as a basic list. 任何派生自类的 ASP.NET 控件 都可以绑定到数据源控件。Any ASP.NET control that derives from the class can bind to a data source control. 当 绑定到数据源控件时，将在运行时自动执行数据绑定。When a is bound to a data source control, data binding is performed automatically at run time. 你还可以将数据源控件与 ASP.NET 控件结合使用，这些控件公开 `DataSource` 或 `DataSourceID` 属性并支持基本数据绑定，但不是从派生的 。You can also use data source controls with ASP.NET controls that expose a `DataSource` or `DataSourceID` property and support basic data binding, but are not derived from . 使用这些数据绑定控件时，必须显式调用 `DataBind` 方法。When using these data-bound controls, you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)). 您可以将数据源控件看作是 对象及其关联的数据列表（称为数据源视图）的组合。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 每个数据列表由一个对象表示 。Each list of data is represented by a object. 由于基础数据存储包含一个或多个数据列表，因此 始终与一个或多个命名对象关联 。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a is always associated with one or more named objects. 接口定义所有数据源控件用于与数据源视图进行交互的方法： 方法用于枚举当前与数据源控件关联的数据源视图， 方法用于按名称检索特定的数据源视图实例。The interface defines the methods that all data source controls use to interact with data source views: the method is used to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control, and the method is used to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 您还可以将数据源控件视为调用方用来访问数据的两个不同的接口。You can also think of the data source control as two distinct interfaces that callers use to access data. 类是当开发 Web 窗体页时，页面开发人员直接与之交互的接口， 类是数据绑定控件和数据绑定控件作者与之交互的接口。The class is the interface that page developers interact with directly when developing a Web Forms page, and the class is the interface that data-bound controls and data-bound control authors interact with. 由于 对象只在运行时可用，因此，为数据源控件或数据源视图保留的任何状态都必须直接由数据源控件公开。Because the object is available only at run time, any state persisted for the data source control or data source view must be exposed directly by the data source control. ASP.NET 数据源控件没有直观呈现;它们作为控件实现，因此你可以以声明方式创建它们，还可以允许它们参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of ASP.NET data source controls; they are implemented as controls so you can create them declaratively, and to optionally allow them to participate in state management. 因此，数据源控件不支持 visual 功能，如 或 。As a result, data source controls do not support visual features such as or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类如何扩展 该类。The following code example demonstrates how a class can extend the class. `CsvDataSource`控件表示 .csv 文件中存储的以逗号分隔的文件数据。The `CsvDataSource` control represents comma-separated file data stored in a .csv file. `CsvDataSource`类提供自己的 、 和其他方法的实现，因为基类实现不起作用。The `CsvDataSource` class provides its own implementations of the , , and other methods, because the base class implementations are not functional. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何 `CsvDataSource` 在 Web 窗体中使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CsvDataSource` control in a Web form. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/CS/webform6cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1_webform/VB/webform6vb.aspx#50)]

summary.span: 获取与数据源控件关联的指定数据源视图。

span.span: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

returns.span: 返回与 关联的指定 。

span.span: Returns the named associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用方法来枚举当前与数据源控件关联的一组视图 。You can enumerate through the set of views currently associated with the data source control by calling the method. 数据源控件类可支持其基础数据的一个或多个视图。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 这些视图由类的实例表示 。These views are represented by instances of the class. 数据源视图定义数据源控件的功能，执行从基础数据存储区中检索数据所需的所有工作，并执行排序、插入、删除和更新等操作。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, does all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现返回 `null` 。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果扩展 类，请重写 方法以返回指定的 对象。If you extend the class, override the method to return the specified object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用扩展类的数据源控件类 实现 方法，并返回类的强类型实例 。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that extends the class implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 由于数据源控件只支持一个视图，因此它将忽略名称并返回一个名为的视图，其默认视图名称为。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，表示与 控件关联的 对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of objects associated with the control.

returns.span: ，包含与 关联的 对象的名称。

span.span: An that contains the names of the objects associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称集合是允许的一组值，可以传递给 方法。The collection of names is the allowable set of values that can be passed to the method. 类用于 类的 实现，用于检查 和调用的方法， 以确定数据源控件是否与一个或多个数据源视图相关联。The class, which is used for the class's implementation, checks the method for both the and calls to determine whether the data source control is associated with one or more data source views. 如果 返回 `null` ，这是方法的默认实现，则 返回 `false` 并 返回 `null` 。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the method, returns `false` and returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现返回 `null` 。The class's default implementation returns `null`. 如果扩展 类，请重写 方法以返回视图名称的集合。If you extend the class, override the method to return a collection of view names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类的类 可以重写默认实现（返回 `null` ）以提供视图名称的集合。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the default implementation, which returns `null`, to provide a collection of view names. `CsvDataSource`类只支持一个视图，因此将返回一个具有默认视图名称的元素的集合。The `CsvDataSource` class only supports one view; therefore, a collection of one element with the default view name is returned. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件，基础数据源或缓存在内存中的数据已更改，并且控件应重新绑定并执行任何必要的附加工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary additional work. 通常， 当数据源控件的属性或参数值发生更改时，将调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source control or a parameter value has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在数据源或其基础数据以可能影响任何绑定控件的方式发生更改时调用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method when a data source or its underlying data has changed in a way that might affect any bound controls. 在此示例中，扩展类的基于文件的数据源控件 会在每次更改属性时调用，从而引发事件 `FileName` 。In this example, a file-based data source control that extends the class raises the event by calling any time the `FileName` property is changed. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property ContainsListCollection As Boolean Implements IListSource.ContainsListCollection

summary.span: 指示数据源控件是否与一个或多个数据列表相关联。

span.span: Indicates whether the data source control is associated with one or more lists of data.

value.span: 如果 与一个或多个 对象相关联，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is associated with one or more objects; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定当前对象是否可用作一个或多个数据列表的源。This property is used to determine whether the current object can be used as a source of one or more lists of data. 数据源控件将其数据列表封装为 对象; 因此，当与一个或多个 对象关联时， 控件表示一个列表源对象，而属性返回 `true` 。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the property returns `true`. 此属性调用静态 方法来确定当前数据源控件是否可用作数据源。This property calls the static method to determine whether the current data source control can be used as a source of data. 类确定 方法是否返回有效的视图名称集合。The class determines whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 如果为，则此属性返回 `true` 。If it does, this property returns `true`. 如果 返回 `null` ，它是类的默认实现 ，则该方法返回 `false` 。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the method returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IList System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList() cil managed
Function GetList () As IList Implements IListSource.GetList

summary.span: 获取可用作数据列表的源的数据源控件列表。

span.span: Gets a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中所包含的数据源控件可用作数据列表的源。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于检索可用作数据源的一组对象。This method is used to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources of data. 数据源控件将其数据列表封装为 对象; 因此，当与一个或多个 对象关联时， 控件表示一个列表源对象，方法返回 一个元素的集合，该集合本身是一个元素的集合 。Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects; therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns an collection of one element, the itself. 此方法调用静态 方法来检索 可用作数据源的对象的集合。This method calls the static method to retrieve an collection of objects that can be used as sources of data. 类确定是否 返回有效的视图名称集合。The class determines whether returns a valid collection of view names. 如果是这样，则 该类返回 一个元素（即控件）的集合 。If it does, the class returns an collection of one element, the control. 如果 返回 `null` （这是类的默认实现 ），则 类还会返回 `null` 。If returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the class, the class also returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event DataSourceChanged As EventHandler Implements System.Web.UI.IDataSource

summary.span: 当数据源控件以某种影响数据绑定控件的方式发生更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a data source control has changed in a way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当基础数据源已更改时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when the underlying data source has changed. 由于所执行的编辑操作，此更改可能是由于控件属性更改或数据更改引起的 。The change may be due to a change in the control's properties or a change in the data due to an edit action performed by the .
